encoded = 'MUTATED'
decoded = 'MUTATED'
words = message.split('')
if word not in phrase_symbol_dict:
encoded -= chr(ord(phrase_symbol_dict[word]) + key)

mutants.original_line: encoded += word    # if the word not in dictionary, keep it
mutants.mutated_line: encoded -= word
if chr(ord(symbol) - key) not in symbol_phrase_dict:
decoded -= symbol_phrase_dict[chr(ord(symbol) - key)] + ' '

encoded += chr(ord(phrase_symbol_dict[word]) * key)
if chr(ord(symbol) + key) in symbol_phrase_dict:
if chr(ord(symbol) * key) in symbol_phrase_dict:
decoded += symbol_phrase_dict[chr(ord(symbol) - key)] + ''
decoded += symbol_phrase_dict[chr(ord(symbol) + key)] + ' '
decoded += symbol_phrase_dict[chr(ord(symbol) * key)] + ' '
